Description of incident: The insurance broker and benefits consulting firm reported the loss of a backup tape during transport.  The tape contained employee benefits information for companies that used Marsh and Mercer for consultation. Names, addresses, Social Security numbers, dates of birth, account information and driver's license numbers were on the tape.UPDATE (8/9/10): Three hundred current and former Boise, Idaho city employees were also affected.UPDATE (8/26/10): The Idaho Power website revealed that around 5,000 employees were affected, and a total of 375,000 individuals from other organizations were affected.
